# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(input_string::String, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(input_string)
    result = ""
    line_length = 0
    for word in words
        if line_length + length(word) > text_width
            result *= "\n"
            line_length = 0
        end
        result *= word * " "
        line_length += length(word) + 1
    end
    return result
end

# Example
input_string = "This is a test string for wrapping"
wrapped_string = wrap_string(input_string, 10)
println(wrapped_string)
```
Output:
```
This is a 
test 
string for 
wrapping 
```
